+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
+    xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    style="@style/FragmentRootPadding"
+    android:orientation="vertical"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent">
+
+    <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout
+        android:id="@+id/title_layout"
+        android:layout_width="0dp"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent">
+
+        <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText
+            android:id="@+id/title"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            style="@style/EditTextStyle.TitleStyle" />
+
+    </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
+
+    <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout
+        android:id="@+id/describe_layout"
+        android:layout_width="0dp"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/title_layout"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent">
+
+        <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText
+            android:id="@+id/describe"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
+
+    </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
+
+    <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.Guideline
+        android:id="@+id/btn_separator"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:orientation="vertical"
+        app:layout_constraintGuide_percent="0.5" />
+
+    <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+        android:id="@+id/btn_save"
+        app:icon="@drawable/ic_baseline_save_24"
+        android:text="@string/note_fragment_btn_save_title"
+        android:layout_width="@dimen/note_fragment_button_width"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/btn_cancel"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/describe_layout" />
+
+    <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+        android:id="@+id/btn_cancel"
+        app:icon="@drawable/ic_baseline_cancel_24"
+        android:text="@string/note_fragment_btn_cancel_title"
+        android:layout_width="@dimen/note_fragment_button_width"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/btn_save"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/describe_layout" />
+
+</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
